# PaymentCardTransactionRequest.TransactionAmountDescription.preauthorization

**Case**

Places a temporary hold on the customer’s account. Only allowed for [doc://com.apple.ProximityReader/documentation/ProximityReader/PaymentCardTransactionRequest/TransactionType/purchase]

## Declaration

```swift
case preauthorization
```
